name: The Great Bork Team ASHCAN
description:
Ashcan of a 3 players +1 gm journey as sled dogs trying to make it home through the Alaskan wilderness. 

I noticed it come up so I will just put this out there,  I am specifically steering away from (pardon my pun) the Iditarod and I chose to focus on the tradition of using sled dogs in everyday life as they were used by the Native communities for years before we made it a race.
